title: Nursing Competency Enhancement: Online Collaborative Project-Based Software Engineering Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced studies and experience in executing high-level projects
context.additional_context: Practical competency enhancement program for medical/nursing field practitioners

learning_goals: Students can complete a three-stage problem-solving project by forming 4-member teams
Learners can execute collaborative processes through role division (coder, tester, planner, documentation manager)
Learners can perform collaborative code development and version control using real-time collaboration tools (Google Colab, GitHub, etc.)
Learners can systematically organize problem-solving strategies gained through the collaboration process via reflective journaling
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
